Package hlo

Class Investment

  • java.lang.Object
    • hlo.Investment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MutualFund, Stock
    public abstract class Investment
extends java.lang.Object
    Investment class is the abstract super class containing super constructors and methods common in subclasses
